content.question: The St. Matthew cross-carpet page of the Lindisfarne Gospels invites meditative reflection through the use of

choices.label: large areas of negative space surrounding medallions containing highly stylized imagery
a progression of scenes depicted as a continuous narrative organized in stacked registers
complex and repetitive abstract designs created from interlacing linear forms
a stylized map of the world including intricate details of locations and people

content.answer: complex and repetitive abstract designs created from interlacing linear forms

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
